name: nod_head
description:
Make the robot nod its head (pitch up and down).

This performs a nod gesture by pitching the head forward and then back to neutral.

optional.name: duration
optional.description: Duration for each movement in seconds

optional.name: angle
optional.description: Angle to pitch in degrees (default 15 degrees)

optional.name: speech
optional.description: Optional text to speak via TTS while nodding
